metadata.Title: CVE-2020-23311 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: There is an Assertion 'context_p->token.type == LEXER_RIGHT_BRACE || context_p->token.type == LEXER_ASSIGN || context_p->token.type == LEXER_COMMA' failed at js-parser-expr.c:3230 in parser_parse_object_initializer in JerryScript 2.2.0.

criterions.comment: iotjs package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
